title: Laugfs increases gas prices
body_lines: The price of a laugfs gas has been increased due to the rupee depreciating against the dollar, Deputy Chairman of Laugfs Gas Thilak de Silva said.
Accordingly, the price of a 12.5 kg cylinder had increased to Rs.4,199 while a 5kg cylinder increased to Rs 1,680.
Mr. Silva said that the company had occurred around Rs. 1 billion loss due to rupee depreciating against the dollar.(Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
